verses.text:
We wait for thee, O Son of God!
And whilst we wait, we sing;
Till thou shalt come with glory crowned,
Our Prophet, Priest, and King.

We wait for thee; when thou shalt come
To take thy people home;
No more in desert lands to roam,
No more in sin to groan.

We wait for thee; O glorious day,
When thou shalt come again;
With all thy saints in bright array,
To bless the sons of men.

We wait for thee; our lamps are bright,
Our robes are pure and white;
We watch and wait throughout the night,
Until the morning light.
